title: JapanBargain 4700, Japanese Dish Set Porcelain Appetizer Plates Soy Sauce Dipping Dishes for Sushi Gift Set, Made in Japan
features: Authentic Japanese Porcelain Dishes Set is great way to impress your dinner guest as you serve your delicious sushi. Unique Japanese Inspired Design, Ideal for Art Collection. Elegant and Smooth Feeling, High End Japanese Dinnerware.

Japanese Dipping Sauce Dishes Set Comes 9 Dishes with Unique Pattern. Small Porcelain Plates are Perfect for Serving Soy Sauce, Wasabi, Ginger, Ketchup and more. Also Great for Serving Sushi, Nigiri, Dim Sum, Appetizer, Sweet, Snacks and Fruit.

Small Japanese Porcelain Plate measures 3-1/2 inches Diameter, 1/2 inches Height. This Traditional Japanese Appetizer Plate was Made from High-grade, High Temperature Firing porcelain, Microwave Safe and Dishwasher Safe, Lead and cadmium free.

Elegant Japanese Dinnerware Set with Gorgeous Box, Perfect Asian Gift for Holidays and any Occasion. Such as Birthday Gift, Father's Day Gift, Mother's Day Gift, Christmas Gift, Wedding Gift, House Warming Gift, Anniversaries Gift, Graduations Gift
Made in Japan, Hand Crafted by Expert Craftsman, Famous Japanese Mino Pottery. Mino-Yaki Japanese Sushi Dinnerware is not only Good in Design, Also Durable Enough to Withstand Daily Use
